lines.text: Why mother, I haven't been out long.
Haven't you? Look at the calendar, what does it say there?
March! And you went out in January!
Done nothing wrong? Are you going to stand there and tell me you're going to disappoint all my neighbors?
Let me tell you, any girl who stays out until 3 in the morning is up to no good!

[the clock chimes]
One o' clock three times.

[swinging a broom]
Get ready for the last roundup, Old Faithful's going to have a busy day, whoopay!
Now mother I must tell you, if you strike me, I'll fetch the police.
Don't bother, I don't want any help!
